p: A total of 10 g of powder of C. europaea was extracted with 100 mL of hydroalcoholic solution (7: 3 v/ v Alcohol: distilled water) for 15 min at 25 °C using the sonicator (Model GT Sonic). The mixture was filtered before being concentrated at 40 °C under vacuum using a rotary evaporator (model BÜCHI 461) [ 15]. The residue was then stored at 4 °C until further use.
